snippet: A raw cow’s milk cheese called Point of Origin is the result of a partnership between Whole Foods and Sixpoint Brewery in Brooklyn.
abstract: Whole Foods sells Point of Origin, its own washed-rind cheese made by Sprout Creek Farm in Poughkeepsie, NY, and washed with Sixpoint Brownstone Brown Ale from Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: A raw cow’s milk cheese called Point of Origin is the result of a partnership between Whole Foods and Sixpoint Brewery in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: A Cheese Washed in Brooklyn Beer
headline.main: Cheese With a Brooklyn Point of View
headline.print_headline: Cheese With a Brooklyn Point of View
